user.title: Select authentication method
user.description: Choose the authentication method for your 3Commas API integration

hmac.title: HMAC Authentication
hmac.description: Enter your 3Commas API credentials and trading mode

rsa.title: RSA Authentication
rsa.description: Enter your 3Commas API key and private key in PEM format, and select your trading mode

error.auth: Invalid credentials. Please check your API key and secret/private key.
error.connection: Unable to connect to 3Commas API. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
error.missing_dependency: Required dependencies are missing. Please install the cryptography package.
